About Me

I'm deeply interested in knowing how can Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning be put together into use to transform the Healthcare industry.


My projects

I have built projects across technologies like Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain. All of them address a social cause.

RespirCov | COVID-19 ventilator status app using blockchain

RespirCov is a blockchain-powered application to provide a live, interactive dashboard for monitoring ventilator availability in an area. It shows hospital-wise numbers for vacant and occupied ventilators enabling the doctors, healthcare activists, patients, and other stakeholders to check the status in real-time.

NephronAI | Fighting chronic kidney disease using deep learning

Around 37 million people worldwide die of chronic kidney disease each year. This is more than even breast or prostrate cancer. Still there are no extensive researches going on in the field.
NephronAI helps us fight chronic kidney disease using deep learning. It is a web-based tool that can be used by individuals, practicing physicians, hospitals, or any organisation to diagnose, as well as get the underlying cause along with a recommended change in lifestyle to help tackle chronic kidney disease.

Generate TV Script using RNNs (Python)

This projects involves generating TV scripts by defining and training a recurrent neural network (deep learning).

Alec AI Assist | Fighting fake news using the google assistant

Alec AI Assist is a voice and text based virtual assistant to help us combat fake news. In this era of social media, it's getting easier for fake news to spread.
And fact-checking on the web has never been easier. Alec AI Assist resolves both the issues. It enables a user to fact check a news, blog, tweet or SMS and return whether that seems fake or true - all by simply talking to it! It is also available on the Google Assistant.
